307481458477726961.Text: You are the Grandmaster of House Hlaalu, %PCName.

26003290602717310479.Text: Once our business is concluded, I will consider your advancement.

29754274322251324644.Text: I can't advance you if you don't belong to House Hlaalu, can I dear?

3026219951219216473.Text: You're the new Grandmaster of House Hlaalu, %PCName. You even outrank your Uncle Crassius. How much farther do you want to go?

27082252162155919761.Text: I can't advance you any more, dumpling. You'll need to see Duke Vedam Dren himself to be a Councilor or even Grandmaster. The Duke is staying in Ebonheart this year. He was the Grandmaster of House Hlaalu, you know, before he inherited his title.

3004932586283503729.Text: I hate to say it, dumpling, but you've been expelled. You need to make amends with Uncle Crassius.

10104138211035623256.Text: You'll still have to earn your advancement, dumpling. No, no, no, you can't just wiggle that snug little waist and change my mind this time.

16834306132881313515.Text: You're an ideal candidate, dumpling, with all the skills we Hlaalu look for... But you just haven't done enough favors for me and the others in House Hlaalu.

1009130211755232733.Text: No one questions your unshakable dedication to House Hlaalu, dumpling, but you need to work on those skills.

1002529664882329219.Text: You need to build up your stronghold again, sweetie-pie, or else I can't make you a %NextPCRank. Talk to Dondos Driler again. He'll tell you what you need... what? What did you say? You killed Dondos Driler? Without him, you'll never complete your stronghold, and never advance in House Hlaalu. Poor dear. You'll just have to be content with your current rank... AND my undying love and affection.

14349273031251019484.Text: You need to build up your stronghold again, sweetie-pie, or else I can't make you a %NextPCRank. Talk to Dondos Driler again. He'll tell you what you need to do.

1982159501948327314.Text: You've done everything you need to do for the rank of %NextPCRank, dumpling... Except build a stronghold. Go talk with Dondos Driler at the Hlaalu Council Manor in Balmora. He'll tell you what you need... what? What did you say? You killed Dondos Driler? Without him, you'll never complete your stronghold, and never advance in House Hlaalu. Poor dear. You'll just have to be content with your current rank... AND my undying love and affection.

1028613232219625890.Text: You've done everything you need to do for the rank of %NextPCRank, dumpling... Except build a stronghold. Go talk with Dondos Driler at the Hlaalu Council Manor in Balmora. He'll tell you everything you need to know.

11325245721449514274.Text: Congratulations, dumpling. You've earned the rank of %NextPCRank.

13284187682860815979.Text: You don't have the qualifications I'm looking for just yet, %PCName. Maybe when you fill out a bit.

2228772063017815503.Text: You must join House Hlaalu before you can receive advancement.

653425998161715931.Text: You are now the Grandmaster of House Hlaalu.

2256115657796124577.Text: You should speak with Duke Dren in Ebonheart.

8466135031099923993.Text: You should speak with your sponsor, Crassius Curio.

4972191472721519374.Text: I cannot advance you further. You must find a sponsor among the Hlaalu Councilors. Since you are a foreigner, you should speak with Crassius Curio. I doubt any of the other Councilors would sponsor you.

3053625967243672619.Text: Why do you ask for advancement? You have done nothing to earn it.

832320766971630749.Text: No one doubts your ability to handle business, but you simply don't have enough experience yet.

14103136412475313018.Text: You have alot of business experience, but some say that you do not have the skills to use what you know.

388728927271969498.Text: Yes, you clearly deserve the rank of %NextPCRank. Congratulations, %PCName.

647816445164239167.Text: You are the %PCRank of House Redoran.

16689258602436323803.Text: You are a Councilman and you are our Hortator. I see no reason not to make you the new %NextPCRank of House Redoran. Congratulations, %NextPCRank %PCName.

9386255432717911047.Text: You are a %PCRank of House Redoran. I cannot advance you further. If you want to become the %NextPCRank, you must defeat Bolvyn Venim.

1207914543323010649.Text: You have been expelled from House Redoran.

111573134646620960.Text: Unfortunately, you do not meet our requirements and you have not performed enough duties.

29318238942902930854.Text: You meet our requirements, but you have not yet performed enough duties.

2569888171339218882.Text: You have an excellent reputation, but you do not meet our requirements.

23798330324383949.Text: You have a good stronghold and you have the support of all the Councilors except for Bolvyn Venim. You deserve to be a %NextPCRank of House Redoran.

2078416504277572137.Text: To become a %NextPCRank, you must earn the support of Garis Llethri and Miner Arobar. You must also improve your Stronghold.

199171693534102100.Text: You have won the support of some of the Councilors and you have built a stronghold. You deserve the title of %NextPCRank.

3781133543178914348.Text: To become a %NextPCRank, you must earn the support of more Councilors.

264492841261269880.Text: Congratulations, %PCName, you have earned the rank of %NextPCRank in House Redoran.

713021754425128647.Text: You must join House Redoran before you can gain ranks.

11325119871413826108.Text: You should speak with Councilor Athyn Sarethi. I cannot advance you to the rank of %NextPCRank.

1585629843039518751.Text: If you want to advance in House Redoran, you should pay more attention to your duties and make more use of our trainers.

1135122087283866064.Text: You have the skills we seek, but you have not performed enough duties yet.

1991564472663317568.Text: You have a good reputation, but you do not meet our requirements.

9964216371043930888.Text: Congratulations, %PCName. You have been promoted to %NextPCRank.

7489177882980625032.Text: You have already risen to the highest rank available to a lay servant of the Imperial cult.

9446249562547513551.Text: You cannot receive advancement unless you join the Imperial Cult.

2563717988255054321.Text: You have been expelled from the Imperial cult. I am disappointed, and ashamed for you.

4572275082694316268.Text: If you want to advance in the service of the Nine, you must dedicate more of your time and resources to serving the cult, and you must strive for personal improvement in your attributes and skills. Only the most distinguished are worthy of advancement to the higher ranks in the Imperial cult. I can tell you more about the Imperial cult ranks and their requirements, if you like.

22034107451990013688.Text: You have the attributes and skills we expect in our higher ranks, but you have not yet dedicated enough time and service to the Nine to warrant advancement. I can tell you more about the Imperial cult ranks and their requirements, if you like.

6951135991852920735.Text: You have served the Nine well, but I'm afraid you do not yet measure up to our high standards for personal attributes and skills. I can tell you more about the Imperial cult ranks and their requirements, if you like.

1034931908382221930.Text: Congratulations, %PCName. You have been promoted to %NextPCRank.

296626785382327551.Text: You have already risen to the highest rank available to a lay servant of the Imperial cult.

2636619714303321337.Text: You cannot receive advancement unless you join the Imperial Cult.

8099101801687115601.Text: You have been expelled from the Imperial cult. I am disappointed, and ashamed for you.

1759824879212279635.Text: If you want to advance in the service of the Nine, you must dedicate more of your time and resources to serving the cult, and you must strive for personal improvement in your attributes and skills. Only the most distinguished are worthy of advancement to the higher ranks in the Imperial cult.

2884921042954915769.Text: You have the attributes and skills we expect in our higher ranks, but you have not yet dedicated enough time and service to the Nine to warrant advancement. I can tell you more about the Imperial cult ranks and their requirements, if you like.

258012671809428607.Text: You have served the Nine well, but I'm afraid you do not yet measure up to our high standards for personal attributes and skills. I can tell you more about the Imperial cult ranks and their requirements, if you like.

98521526417425684.Text: Congratulations, %PCName. You have been promoted to %NextPCRank.

5134101771476218428.Text: You have already risen to the highest rank available to a lay servant of the Imperial cult.

1361337043259526711.Text: You cannot receive advancement unless you join the Imperial Cult.

140138848191929564.Text: You have been expelled from the Imperial cult. I am disappointed, and ashamed for you.

18377127173261210770.Text: If you want to advance in the service of the Nine, you must dedicate more of your time and resources to serving the cult, and you must strive for personal improvement in your attributes and skills. Only the most distinguished are worthy of advancement to the higher ranks in the Imperial cult.

14660942526431924.Text: You have the attributes and skills we expect in our higher ranks, but you have not yet dedicated enough time and service to the Nine to warrant advancement. I can tell you more about the Imperial cult ranks and their requirements, if you like.

2026824867750511125.Text: You have served the Nine well, but I'm afraid you do not yet measure up to our high standards for personal attributes and skills. I can tell you more about the Imperial cult ranks and their requirements, if you like.

28292135962182925747.Text: Congratulations, %PCName. You have been promoted to %NextPCRank.

124401521639847837.Text: You have already risen to the highest rank available to a lay servant of the Imperial cult.

3117615027220214946.Text: You cannot receive advancement unless you join the Imperial Cult.

2587032457221523993.Text: You have been expelled from the Imperial cult. I am disappointed, and ashamed for you.

901818461101694338.Text: If you want to advance in the service of the Nine, you must dedicate more of your time and resources to serving the cult, and you must strive for personal improvement in your attributes and skills. Only the most distinguished are worthy of advancement to the higher ranks in the Imperial cult.

7122108372643522238.Text: You have the attributes and skills we expect in our higher ranks, but you have not yet dedicated enough time and service to the Nine to warrant advancement. I can tell you more about the Imperial cult ranks and their requirements, if you like.

18064260942749916897.Text: You have served the Nine well, but I'm afraid you do not yet measure up to our high standards for personal attributes and skills. I can tell you more about the Imperial cult ranks and their requirements, if you like.

824626281811019302.Text: Congratulations, %PCName. You have been promoted to %NextPCRank.

1923313321114742548.Text: You want to speak with me about advancement? Am I ready for the next rank, %PCRank?

174125462752523263.Text: I cannot offer you advancement unless you join the Mages Guild.

2187111922284419218.Text: You have been expelled and you must make amends.

240406882220330171.Text: You have been expelled from the Mages Guild. You should speak with Arch-Mage Trebonius in Vivec and make amends.

107193086989225800.Text: Advancement in the Mages Guild does not occur by magic. Pay more attention to your duties and make sure you understand our requirements.

4019180222525518104.Text: You meet our requirements, %PCName, but you have not yet completed the duties expected of a %NextPCRank.

19832237922992719418.Text: The Mages Guild appreciates the duties you've done, but you simply do not meet our requirements for %NextPCRank.

21876270302919121426.Text: Have you come to challenge me for the title of Arch-Mage?

1530715305218225887.Text: As long as he holds the title, only Arch-Mage Trebonius in Vivec can grant you the title of %NextPCRank.

23762164811207612254.Text: In order to advance to the rank of %NextPCRank, you must have a Wizard's Staff.

471231169661325663.Text: Congratulations. You are now %PCName the %NextPCRank. Strive ever forward.

2796421667402826914.Text: Excellent, %PCName. Now that these formalities are out of the way, I can grant you the rank of %NextPCRank.

467916904699519114.Text: You cannot advance until you pay your dues. The Mages Guild Charter only allows us to accept Imperial coin.

286572939837899986.Text: In order to advance to %NextPCRank, you must pay your Guild Dues of 200 septims. Will you pay these dues now?

2746832535745532019.Text: In order to advance to %NextPCRank, you must pay your Guild Dues of 200 septims.

13223869023728562.Text: Congratulations. You are now officially %PCName, the %NextPCRank. Study diligently and perform your duties.

1403130214698924047.Text: Advancement? No way you could do that unless you want to join the Thieves Guild.

902419710316431866.Text: If you do all the jobs I have for you, I will grant you the rank of %NextPCRank.

17305274913023624645.Text: You are also a %PCRank now. For more advancement, speak with Gentleman Jim Stacey in Vivec.

94121548391225757.Text: You broke the honor among thieves. Make amends or you will never be %PCNextRank.

15847243611060214429.Text: Perform more jobs for your brother thieves and practice your skills.

1529322178139754522.Text: No one questions your skills as a thief, but some question your loyalty. You should do more jobs for your brother thieves.

256993512447710148.Text: No one questions your loyalty, but you must practice your skills to become %PCName the %NextPCRank.

48820251194114713.Text: You have advanced as far as you can without challenging me, the Grandmaster.

67066886216451661.Text: Only Eno Hlaalu in Vivec can grant you the rank of %NextPCRank. But you are strong. Why not take the rank of Grandmaster for yourself?

7471248472649541.Text: First you must join the Morag Tong.

31153659443617006.Text: You have soiled the honor of the Morag Tong. Make amends or you will never be %PCNextRank.

29968223914325815.Text: Honorably execute writs and practice your skills. You are not ready yet.

65412813424900431.Text: Your technique is superb, but some question your depth of devotion. Perform more honorable executions in the name of the Morag Tong. These writs are currently outstanding.

14133143502354820053.Text: Your honor and devotion to the Morag Tong is unmatched in the guild, but your technique is lacking. Redouble your training and practice your skills to become %PCName the %NextPCRank.

2826269525412612.Text: What can I do for you, %PCRank?

13263322542730711572.Text: Do the duties I give you and you will earn advancement.

8025186972033532360.Text: Only Tholer Saryoni at the High Fane in Vivec can make you a %NextPCRank of the Temple.

7068322491643310542.Text: You are not a member. Do you wish to join the Temple?

753630530427715364.Text: You have blasphemed against the Temple's doctrines. Make amends or you will never be %PCNextRank.

1894280941600718005.Text: Perform your duties and practice your skills. You are not ready yet.

2962924587392114456.Text: Your talents are noteworthy, but some question your depth of devotion. Perform more duties for the Temple and you will soon be rewarded.

10814449268322009.Text: Your devotion to the Temple is not in question, but you still require a bit more experience. Redouble your training and practice your skills to become %PCName the %NextPCRank.

819843582566224524.Text: The Temple recognizes you, %PCName. You are now %PCName the %NextPCRank.

324073501633624428.Text: I can't advance you yet, %PCRace. You interested in joining the Fighters Guild?

23482160911376113137.Text: You have soiled the honor of the Fighters Guild. Make amends or you will never be %PCNextRank.

18280281691568113452.Text: You are the Guildmaster. There are none higher in rank than you.

2162263530688553.Text: You wish to advance further, %PCRank? There really isn't much farther for you to advance, save for taking my position! We can discuss that later, though. First, I have some orders for you.

16628319492544916441.Text: I can't advance you anymore, %PCRank. For further advancement, you'll have to talk to Sjoring Hard-Heart himself in Vivec.

1056415252841031382.Text: Perform your duties and practice your skills. You are not ready yet.

3175629439143964105.Text: Your talents are noteworthy, but some question your depth of devotion. Perform more duties for the Fighters Guild and you will earn your place.

2083432752205215749.Text: Your devotion to the Fighters Guild is not in question, but you still require more experience. Redouble your training and practice your skills to become %PCName the %NextPCRank.

1378729702645021565.Text: The Fighters Guild recognizes you, %PCName. You are now %PCName the %NextPCRank.

3043219949258313670.Text: You still want advancement? There can only be one Knight of the Imperial Dragon on Vvardenfell. To take my place, you must defeat me in an honorable duel in the Arena.

9434310111342024195.Text: If you follow all my orders, I will give you the rank you deserve.

46351188827076872.Text: You have to sign up before I can give you a rank, %PCRace. You want to join the Imperial Legion?

1423733531351122222.Text: But you are the Knight of the Imperial Dragon! You don't need advancement.

31228123011781867.Text: I cannot give you advancement anymore. Talk to the Knight of the Imperial Dragon, Varus Vatinius, in Ebonheart.

16976196101546632345.Text: You have to join the Imperial Legion before you can advance, %PCName.

248193252619595.Text: You're a disgrace to the Legions. Get out of my sight, %PCName.

26993233411110519314.Text: You're in a bit of trouble, %PCName. Report to Darius in Gnisis to make amends or you'll face Imperial justice.

2330319711296419700.Text: You don't meet the requirements of %NextPCRank. Plus, you haven't followed enough orders yet.

18353261331048130250.Text: You can fight with the best of them, but you don't seem to understand how to follow orders.

13417788477069558.Text: You are a good soldier, %PCName. I am proud to give you the rank of %NextPCRank, and these pauldrons and boots.

2694017565242772001.Text: You're a good soldier and you follow orders, but there's concern you may not be up to the requirements of %NextPCRank. Work out some more and practice with our trainers.

2556810582441031087.Text: You are a good soldier, %PCName. I am proud to give you the rank of %NextPCRank, and this helmet and bracers.

3577298171310732405.Text: You are a good soldier, %PCName. I am proud to give you the rank of %NextPCRank, and this cuirass and greaves.

14671138481440611745.Text: You are a good soldier, %PCName. I am proud to give you the rank of %NextPCRank, and these pauldrons and boots.

3184813218222121086.Text: You are a good soldier, %PCName. I am proud to give you the rank of %NextPCRank, and this helm and gauntlets.

326478402283706212.Text: You are a good soldier, %PCName. I am proud to give you the rank of %NextPCRank, and this armor.

23219116441422357.Text: You are a good soldier, %PCName. I am proud to give you the rank of %NextPCRank, and this shield.

60031221297423319.Text: You are a good soldier, %PCName. I am proud to give you the rank of %NextPCRank.

1051627123405714789.Text: You are the new Archmagister of House Telvanni.

200130052244715676.Text: You are now a Magister of House Telvanni. You must defeat Archmagister Gothren.

1262718877221279099.Text: You have chosen the title Magister, forgoing the chance to advance further in House Telvanni. But... have you changed your mind?

22499120482122911301.Text: If you wish, I can declare you a Magister in House Telvanni. But you should be aware of what a Magister is and does.

923913448101947190.Text: You must perform more chores before I would be willing to consider you for the highest ranks of House Telvanni.

238741267377054541.Text: I heard you were expelled. I will take care of this for you.

21305136682615017413.Text: You have not done enough chores and you do not meet the requirements.

19391130571424027170.Text: No. You have not done enough chores.

13170241112401032151.Text: No. You do not meet our requirements.

1896381111993977.Text: Yes, you have met all the requirements. You are now %NextPCRank %PCName of House Telvanni.

60825653542313462.Text: You are qualified for %NextPCRank, but you must first build a stronghold.

256103070510481544.Text: Yes, you are more than qualified for %NextPCRank.

121357284559423446.Text: You are the new %PCRank of House Telvanni.

2977722203222218475.Text: I cannot advance you to %NextPCRank. You must speak with your patron, Master Aryon.

61117595262204154.Text: I cannot advance you to %NextPCRank. You must find a patron in House Telvanni.

22990247762784528944.Text: Do you wish to join House Telvanni? You must do this before you can receive advancement.

1401223711470113480.Text: Oh, you've been expelled. Let me take care of that for you.

286207969145162762.Text: Why? You have done nothing towards %NextPCRank. You have neither the chores nor the requirements.

2783228222687730098.Text: You have the skills we seek, but you have no done enough chores for House Telvanni.

718616131802927955.Text: You've done plenty of chores, but you don't meet our requirements.

1343227074600616390.Text: Yes, we find you worthy of %NextPCRank.

714828109185914298.Text: Once our business is concluded, I will consider your advancement.

1558828954153928039.Text: Yes, you clearly deserve the rank of %NextPCRank. Congratulations, %PCName.
